bio:
Prior to being a Recitation Instructor, Wayne served as a Grader in Computer Science at NYU Shanghai. Wayne has more than 7 years experience in teaching and 8 years in computer science, filled with passion in all levels of education and consulting. He is a problem-solver and dedicated to finding all the possible and optimal ways . Away from the 0-1 world, Wayne is a sportsperson, fond in badminton and skiing and is also pursuing to be a psychology consultant and movie maker.

Education

  • Bachelor's Degree in Software Engineering, Beijing Institute of Technology, 2012
  • Master's Degree in Computer Science, New York University, 2014                 

Research Interests

  • Quantum Computing
  • Human Computer Interaction

Languages

  • English
  • Mandarin
